subject.name: AP Physics
subject.description: Advanced Placement Physics 1, along with AP Physics 2, is a year-long AP course whose first exam was given in 2015.

subject.name: AP Calc. AB
subject.description: Advanced Placement Calculus (also known as AP Calculus, AP Calc, or simply AB / BC) is a set of two distinct Advanced Placement calculus courses

subject.name: AP Calc. BC
subject.description: Advanced Placement Calculus (also known as AP Calculus, AP Calc, or simply AB / BC) is a set of two distinct Advanced Placement calculus courses

subject.name: AP Biology
subject.description: Advanced Placement Biology is an Advanced Placement biology course and exam offered by the College Board in the United States.
